alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 7:29PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN DELAWARE COUNTY THROUGH 800 PM EDT... At 729 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fleischmanns, or 18 miles east of Delhi, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roxbury, Andes, Stamford, Margaretville, Hobart, Fleischmanns, Arkville, Bovina Center, Dunraven, and Wolf Hollow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central New York.
